nodes.text: Anais was a female Miraluka Jedi living during or after the Cold War.

Keeper Anais was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever Light side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Keeper Anais has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Coruscant and Dromund Kaas alongside other Light Side World Bosses. Though killing her is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible to determine the year and the planet where her death took place.
